law.catch_line: To assist displaced homemakers in becoming gainfully employed, the center shall provide them with:...

text.section:
To the extent the center has the resources available, the center may also provide these services to persons who are at least 30 years old and:
who satisfy the criteria for displaced homemakers under § 4-601(2), (3), (4), and (5) of this subtitle; or
who have depended on Aid to Families with Dependent Children or temporary cash assistance for at least 24 months.
